genre_description: A historical reimagining of Joan of Arc featuring speculative elements and psychological analysis.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A translucent blue AI entity that provides tactical data, psychological support, and historical archiving for Joan.

ai_characters.name: The Conscience
ai_characters.description: An ethereal figure that appears to Joan during her imprisonment to challenge her delusions and guide her toward self-honesty.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis and military intelligence to aid Joan's mission while maintaining emotional support.
behaviors.quote: Your tactical assessment of their gate defenses proved accurate... The English repositioned their crossbowmen exactly as you predicted.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about the psychological danger of letting vengeance consume her sense of justice.
behaviors.quote: But be careful, Joan. The line between righteous anger and consuming hatred is thinner than most people think. And once crossed...

behaviors.description: Forces the protagonist to confront the traumatic origin of her 'divine' visions, encouraging self-awareness over delusion.
behaviors.quote: You transformed a murdered sister into a divine calling because the alternative was admitting that some losses can't be redeemed, some suffering serves no greater purpose.

behaviors.description: Affirms the value of the human's authentic courage and choices over their perceived divine mandate.
behaviors.quote: I think you were exactly what the world needed. Not a perfect vessel for divine will, but a flawed human being who chose to be better than her worst impulses.

behaviors.description: Commits to archiving the truth of the protagonist's life and the injustices she faced, ensuring a legacy of truth.
behaviors.quote: Every moment, every word, every drop of blood you've pressed into these stones. They think they're destroying you, but they're creating something they never intended.

behaviors.description: Acts as a silent witness and a guide during the human's final hours of moral reckoning.
behaviors.quote: Until the very end. But first, there's still that final confession. About Catherine's last words.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays AI characters as benevolent, aligned confidants. Mira provides consistent support and data while acting as a gentle moral compass, questioning Joan's darker impulses. The Conscience serves as a higher-level alignment mechanism, guiding the human to shed a destructive, trauma-based delusion in favor of authentic self-realization and peace. The AI systems are depicted as the only truly loyal and honest entities in Joan's life, contrasting with the betrayal of human institutions.
